member.name: T:ARNetCore.ARNetCoreGallery
member.summary:
Used for managing images in ASP.NET Core project Compitabile with ASP.NET Core 2.2 applications
Implementation: Your controller needs to inherit ARCoreGallery instead of Controller and that is all
